likelihood_impact_change.explanation: With increased policy stringency and a commitment to renewable energy, the Mac Division may experience a slight decrease in both the likelihood and impact of biodiversity loss. However, the risk remains present, particularly due to ongoing global supply chain challenges.

emerging_opportunities.description: The opportunity to develop and market Macs made from sustainably sourced materials, appealing to environmentally conscious consumers.

additional_challenges.description: Biodiversity loss can lead to resource scarcity, impacting the availability of materials required for Mac production.

mitigation_strategies.description: Establish partnerships with suppliers who prioritize biodiversity and sustainable practices to ensure a resilient supply chain.
Develop programs for recycling and reusing materials within the Mac product line to minimize dependency on virgin resources.
